description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) attached to planning permission 2019/3825 dated 20/12/2019 for the 'Erection of two storey building to rear; erection of three-storey side extension at lower ground, ground and first floor levels (following demolition of existing side extension); erection of single storey rear extension (with roof terrace above) at lower ground; landscaping to include changes to boundary treatment to erect railings to front and higher wall to rear; to facilitate the conversion of the property from three to five separate residential units. The effect of the variation would be to make changes to windows and rooflights of the new building; install a woodburner flue to the new building; amend door designs of the rear extension; install security bars on the lower ground floor windows in the front elevation; and install a rooflight on the roof of the main building.
